mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ((t_order_item oi JOIN t_product p ON oi.pid=p.pid) JOIN t_order o ON oi.oid=o.oid AND oi.oid=#{oid}) JOIN t_order_status s ON o.sid = s.sid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order_item(number, prices, oid, pid) VALUES(#{number}, #{prices}, #{order.id}, #{product.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order_item SET number=#{number}, prices=#{prices}, oid=#{order.id}, pid=#{product.id} WHERE oiid = #{id}
